summary: Website admin panel with editable content sections, gallery management, and improved preview/publish workflow.

existing_features.title: Add backend data models and APIs to support admin-editable page content for all sections referenced in the admin guide (Home page content, Mission section, Testimonials/Reviews headings/content blocks, and any About/Contact text blocks), so that these sections are no longer hard-coded in the frontend.

Extend the Admin Panel UI to include dedicated editing forms for each newly supported editable section (at minimum: Home hero headline/subheadline/description, Mission title/body text, Reviews/Testimonials section heading text, Contact page intro text), with Save actions that persist to the backend draft content APIs.

Implement a simple, easy-to-manage Preview workflow: allow admins to preview draft content on public pages without publishing, using a URL-based preview mode that can be toggled from the Admin Panel via a clearly visible Preview button.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make all mentioned site sections editable in the admin area (home content, mission, testimonials, about/contact, and other page sections).
Add/Improve an easy-to-manage Preview button for admins to preview changes before publishing.

If the backend state schema changes are required to store new draft/published site content, add a safe Motoko upgrade path that preserves existing canister data (courses, gallery images, review images, submitted reviews, contact info, profiles, inquiries) during upgrades.

projectName: Make all mentioned website sections editable in Admin and add an easy Preview workflow
